generate_job_description.title: Generate Job Description
generate_job_description.hint: pass all you know about the job requirements, client and interview procedure to generate job description

create_social_media_post.title: Create Social Media Post
create_social_media_post.hint: pass job description and generate post for social media

match_resumes.title: Resume Matching
match_resumes.hint: pass job requirements and link to resumes or text of resumes to know which of resumes are more suitable for the job

scan_resume.title: Resume Scan for Mistakes
scan_resume.hint: pass link to CV and get list of issues found with suggested corrections
